website_summaries.verdict: Another affordable pick for those that want a reliable jacket without sacrificing durability.
pros: Figure-fitting design keeps buyers warm, comfortable, and reduces resistance in water
Includes extra fabric in the underarms
cons: A little longer than some buyers expected
Customers should order 1 to 2 sizes up

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this jacket, well made and high quality, keeps me warm during my aqua aerobics workout. It has the extra fabric around the arm pit area for the stretching exercises. True to the size. I'm 5'5" tall, 120 lbs, Size 6 fits me great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality of this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of this jacket. Bought it for snorkeling. Fits good on land but will be big in the water. Sending 3x back for 2x. 5’10” 175
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this wet suit jacket. For such a great price, it is exactly what I was looking for. Great quality, Well-made but Affordable! The sizing is accurate, mine fits well. I also like the bright colors. Can't wait to wear it in the 50 degree water next week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the look but it did not keep me warm
customer_reviews.text: I love the look but it did not keep me warm. I am naturally a cold person so I am ordering something thicker. It is not a 3/2 it is a 1.5mm.
customer_reviews.author: Marie E.

customer_reviews.title: Great little jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great little jacket! The quality was good and I like the colors. I listened to the reviews and ordered up 2 sizes. It worked ok, but really I should've only ordered up 1 size.
customer_reviews.author: KGee

customer_reviews.title: Kept me warm
customer_reviews.text: Great wet suit top. Used for a trip in Hawaii, I tend to get cold while out in the ocean snorkeling, this top allowed me to stay out for over an hour and still stay warm. I found the jacket to be flexible and loved that it was easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: awg

customer_reviews.title: Jacket serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit jacket fits as expected. I actually bought it to use sometimes in the “heated “ swimming pool at my fitness center that often isnt😜. Sometimes i just can’t quite take the cold water. We also occasionally go to Hawaii, and I have used a jacket before. Helps me to feel safer in ocean waves, and a bit warmer if water is cool. These jackets are supposed to be tight, so I ordered up a size to make it easier to get on and off. Works fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: nana58

customer_reviews.title: Order true to size unless you are tall
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a larger size based on reviews. However the suit kept riding up around my neck because it was too large. I would’ve rated it a higher rating because it was comfortable (outside of the pool) and easy to use. However I ended up giving it to a larger friend because the top riding up and binding my neck for swimming because it just did not fit me. For reference, I am 5’2” and 119. Broad shoulders. normally wear a medium
customer_reviews.author: jrj

customer_reviews.title: Used twice, very pleased overall
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for snorkeling in Hawaii and Aruba. Granted, the water in both locations during the summer would be considered warm to any normal person, but I'm always cold, and even if I don't start off cold, I get cold very quickly. This jacket, combined with the Gold Fin pants (the light blue on both don't quite match, but if you're not looking too closely, they could be a set), allowed me to stay in the water for over an hour on each trip. Jacket was true to size.
customer_reviews.author: robyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Scuba Diving
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'4" 120 lbs 34B and ordered a large based on the reviews. It fit great. A little snug dry (not uncomfortable) and felt great once wet. I wore it to scuba dive in Jamaica and it kept me really warm. Would definitely order again as price is great compared to dive shop prices and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Warm enough for the pool
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for swimming in the pool. I'm always cold, so I was freezing even in the "heated" local pool. This jacket allowed me to be comfortable in the pool. I plan on using it for snorkeling in the Caribbean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. BrothersTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works well in the pool except it's too big. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well in the pool except it's too big. The size chart wasn't helpful to me. I should go down a size. I suggest you buy two sizes and send one back.
customer_reviews.author: Sjwcslook

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, comfortable, inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for early season rafting and everyone was absolutely raving about it. It got me through some very cold water days and rescue training. Doesn't get any better!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket - good price
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’2” - 110 lbs. I was impressed with the quality at this price. I originally ordered a M and it was too snug. I wore it anyway because I didn’t have time to exchange it before our trip. The sleeves were sealed so no water got in and it did the job for keeping me warm. I just ordered a L for our next trip, but it hasn’t arrived yet.
customer_reviews.author: Czanb

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!!
customer_reviews.text: The chart says to order 3xl if you're a US size 12-can't even get it zipped. So, in light of that I'd order 3 or 4 times your regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: it is what it says
customer_reviews.text: I don't expect companies to make wet suits for petite people, so I shouldn't be surprised that it didn't fit properly. I'm 5'1", about 120 lbs, so of course the length was too long. It looks good and fits ok, not great. Too bad you can't try it on in the water first!
customer_reviews.author: Adriane P.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is important.
customer_reviews.text: I purchases this in a Size 6, based on previous reviews, for swimming laps. I am 5' 5" and weigh 115 pounds. I like the weight of the neoprene. It's just right for swimming. However, the size 6 is too large and rides up in the pool. This will work for kayaking, though. I plan to order another one in size 4, a medium, for the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Runs small!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2" 36DD and I ordered a US XL=8 and it fit great. This size fit great and color is good and has a nice style. Seems to be made out of quality material but wished it was 2mm thick. We will see how well it holds up to diving.
customer_reviews.author: jmbet

customer_reviews.title: cute, but not collar not sewn symmetrically
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in a S (5'4", 112, 34a) and the fit was great and the colors cute, but the collar was wider on one side than the other. I liked it so much I tried ordering a second one, but it also had a collar with different widths on each side. It was also a little more stiff and seemingly less flexible than some of the others I tried on. Going back.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: sizing
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an inexpensive wetsuit shirt to wear in the pool to keep me warm during aqua class. It does keep me warm. It is very, very small! I am a ladies L-XL. I bought a 2X because the reviews said to order up a size. It was extremely small. I looked at the size chart which stated I needed a 5X. The largest size available was a 3X. It is very difficult to zip but I kept it anyway because it is warm. I wish that my size would have been available. I also wish that accurate sizing would have been more transparent.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie R.

customer_reviews.title: Listen to sizing advise
customer_reviews.text: Will Use for Snorkeling. I took advice of reviews saying sizes run small and ordered an XL over a medium...fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen D.

customer_reviews.title: fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I am a 5'4' 118 lb. woman. Chest measurement of 34'. I bought the medium size and it fits me comfortably snug ( as a wetsuit should). I haven't worn it in the water yet, but am looking forward to being a bit warmer rafting down/and swimming in the Eel River in northern California!
customer_reviews.author: Leah H.

customer_reviews.title: Look at the size chart to pick your size
customer_reviews.text: I’m a swim coach for young kids & sometimes I have to get in the pool with them. We swim outdoor year round, so I got this to keep me warm in the water/air. Pool is heated, but air temp in cold. I tried it out the other day, so far so good. I usually wear Ladies M, I’m small chested, athletic build. Glad I got the 2xl (size 10) fits well, snug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great just order larger
customer_reviews.text: 5'5, 135 lbs. Normally size 6-8 for womens clothing, have normal body frame but wide shoulders. Ordered size 2x and suit was painfully tight under arms and could barely zip around waist. Had to return to ordered size 3x!. Material and product is amazing for the price. Looks better than other high price wet suits, just recomend ordering larger.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8 and 138 lbs. I purchased a 2XL and the fit is good. A little snug but it loosens up in the water. Nice and stretchy for water aerobics. In winter I am wearing it over a fleece-lined rash guard for extra warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie HananTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The best for the beach
customer_reviews.text: I love this wetsuit jacket! It keeps me warm in cold water and fits me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Fun Family

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: This top runs very, very small. I am 5'6" and 165 lbs. The largest size available lacked about 10" coming together to attempt to zip. The top also had a very strong chemical smell. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Fits small but the quality was great
customer_reviews.text: The quality was great and it fit everywhere except in the chest. I got the largest size they had and I usually buy an medium or large in women's tops.
customer_reviews.author: TracyIN Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with this when I got it. Sizing can be tricky to get right,i went with a 2xl/10 because of DD chest,5'5" 132 lbs. It fits great although not sure how much stretch I will get in the water. I really don't think they run that small like some say. The colors are great,seems pretty thick.
customer_reviews.author: Karlyrie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2x sizes larger than my size. Fit me perfectly. Keeps me warm. Looks good. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: I'm an average-sized woman but bought the largest one they offered, 3XXX, thinking there would be lots of room. It's extremely snug, difficult to get on and off because how tight it is, but it certainly keeps me warm in cooler water. I just wish it was a bit roomier.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love the top. Got the wetsuit bottoms, too. So much easier than a one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Runs horribly small
customer_reviews.text: Horribly small. My size is 10 to 12. Ordered an XL. The sleeves fit but nothing else. I may as well have ordered a size 2.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Weird cut. Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. I usually wear size 2. Bought size M and it won’t even close on the front. I will be returning. I am afraid that if I order XL will be too lose on the shoulders. I don’t think I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: book4sell

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me warm!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on. True to size, mine fits great! The neoprene is not too light or heavy, and its easy to move in. I really like this wet suit.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Got a vest instead
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like how the fabric bunched up under armpit, I ordered a vest and a long sleeved swim suit instead.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Family

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: It’s super nice looking, even better in person. Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Runs very very small.
customer_reviews.text: I like the jacket very much. I was shocked by the size chart which indicated that I needed an Xtra large(I am normally a true medium). So believe the chart. It fits a little large but it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Halloy

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear in the surf in Hawaii because I get cold easily. It was wonderful. Keep me warm and help to protect me from sunburn. Fit great and was comfortable. I am 5'5' and about 120. I bought a large and it was a good comfortable fit. Packs easily. I ordered a couple other brands but liked the fit of this one best
customer_reviews.author: Rich Riedy

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit and couldn't get over the smell
customer_reviews.text: Irregular fit for sizing and the smell was awful. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm but get size larger
customer_reviews.text: Keeps you warm for outdoor water aerobics. Be sure to get a larger size because it is snug from waist down.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kohn

customer_reviews.title: Value for money and comfortable to move around in the pool
customer_reviews.text: Fit well (120 lbs, size small). Just tried at the outdoor pool, which the water was a little chill, it is easy to move and swim around the pool. Value for money. Unsure how long it will last in the chlorine water pool.
customer_reviews.author: Diep Lan

customer_reviews.title: Great Wetsuit top!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wetsuit, it is perfect for rehabbing in my pool. I usually wear a small, or even an x-small, though I read the reviews and ordered a Medium and it fits great! The material is comfortable, fits tight enough and I am very happy I ordered this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors
customer_reviews.text: Cute jacket, but even the smallest size was too big so I have no idea how it performs.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny E. Picower

customer_reviews.title: Wet suit too
customer_reviews.text: My top is awesome. I was just in Florida the water temp around 60. My suit allowed me to stay in water a long time. I may recommend higher than a 1.5mm. I tried to under water and it took my breath away.
customer_reviews.author: Tavargo

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick when I went scuba diving during summer months. Not thick enough for water colder than 65 degrees F.
customer_reviews.author: I. Jung

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Believe the reviews when they say “order larger size”. I usually wear a large shirt. I’ll order XL sweatshirts so they can be roomy. But in this, I ordered 3XL and it’s perfect. I’m also tall (5’10”) and it fits my long arms. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Boone

customer_reviews.title: Cute and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I wore this while snorkeling in the Galápagos Islands. The water was chilly so this came in handy. It worked out very well, is great for the price and looks cute on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: Quality of fabric and stitching is excellent! The size Med was a little too snug for the 34 chest/28 waist person it was purchased for.
customer_reviews.author: A. K. Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jacket
customer_reviews.text: This works well for outdoor water aerobics classes in October!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for my shape
customer_reviews.text: Very cute product and good quality. I’m too top heavy so unfortunately it did not fit for me. And sad that it didn’t. I had to size up so my boobs would fit but then the arms were to long.
customer_reviews.author: iPhone

customer_reviews.title: 3 sizes too small
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. I wear a size 4 dress and I could not even get the large size on. I am not even sure that the extra large size would fit. It’s a pity as it is a good looking vest and the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Jean d.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is amazing.. style and comfort. I love this top for cool months and evening paddles.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Harryman

customer_reviews.title: Water jacket
customer_reviews.text: The jacket came in so small I couldn’t get it on!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Need to return.
customer_reviews.text: Very small in sizing. Can not get worst thru end of sleeve. No invoice inside package or instructions to return.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Binder

customer_reviews.title: Defective and not what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived with a zipper that did not work. After looking at the product more closely, I realized it wasn't even the same brand or color that I ordered. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me warm when pool, ocean or waterpark water is cold.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent prime shopper

customer_reviews.title: It does what I wanted it to do.
customer_reviews.text: I’m using it for early morning water aerobic exercise classes. Great for holding body heat, but a little restrictive for movement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Order larger than chart says.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but was too small for me. I needed it to be larger.
customer_reviews.author: Keta K.

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: This jacket ran small - sold it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Y

customer_reviews.title: It was satisfactory to a degree.
customer_reviews.text: It was bought for a friend who said it didn't provide 100% warmth. She felt a bit of the cold.
customer_reviews.author: rahz

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a long sleeved jacket and received a sleeveless vest.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way too long for what I wanted, and so fit poorly. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: IRENE BRENNAN

customer_reviews.title: Go Up a Size
customer_reviews.text: It definitely ran a little small, so I'm glad I went up a size. Could be a little tighter around the neck, because it lets water flow in. Kept my top warm in semi cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: after a year I still like it
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 6. I am 5'7" and 125 lbs. The pool where I swim is too cool for me and this has made a huge difference- plus capri neoprene pants. I recently discovered the neoprene bra and now I wear that underneath and things are perfect. Get the bra! I have not tried thicker neoprene yet in a jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: EYCE Women’s 1.5 mm Wetsuits Jacket Long Sleeve Neoprene Wetsuit Top
product_meta.description: Size | Bust | Waist | Small | 31"-33" | 22"-24" | Medium | 33"-35" | 26"-28" | Large | 35"-37" | 28"-30" | X-Large | 36"-38" | 30"-32" | 2X-Large | 37"-39" | 31"-33" | 3X-Large | 39"-41" | 33"-35" | Please check out our EYCE Dive & Sail Matching Neoprene Wetsuit Pants. Our wetsuit jackets are specially designed to be figure-fitting which reduces the drag in water and keeps the divers warm. It should fit snugly, tight to the body. Please carefully CHECK our SIZE CHART to get best fit wetsuit.
feature_bullets: Please check our SIZE CHART at the 2nd picture. Please carefully CHECK our SIZE CHART to get best fit wetsuit. Also check out our EYCE Dive & Sail Matching Neoprene Wetsuit Pants.
Our wetsuit jackets are specially designed to be figure-fitting which reduces the drag in water and keeps the divers warm. It should fit snugly, tight to the body.

Our wetsuit jackets are made from neoprene- synthetic rubber. The wetsuit jacket might seem too tight when the customers are trying on at home or anywhere out of the water but will turn out to be just right when the wetsuit jacket is wet. Because when the wetsuit jacket is dry, it tend to stick in some places. When it fills with water the sticky spots slip a little.
Neoprene is a material that will stretch. After being worn several times, the wetsuit jacket should be stretched in all the right places and will be at its ideal fit.

3/2 mm thick Neoprene; High Elastic and durable; Waterproof and heat insulation; Heavy duty Front zipper; Easy entry and exit; Flatlock seams; Excellent Durability; Fantastic ComfortPerfect to keep your body warm in the coldest conditions for DIVING, KAYAKING, CANOEING, PADDLE BOARDING, KITE BOARDING, WAKE BOARDING and other water sports
